choices.D: It determines which FortiGuard server is used for license validation.
choices.C: Its value is incremented with each packet lost.
choices.A: Its initial value is calculated based on the round trip delay (RTT).
choices.B: Its initial value is statically set to 10.

choices.D: A UDP session with only one packet received.
choices.B: A TCP session waiting for FIN ACK.
choices.C: A UDP session with packets sent and received.
choices.A: A TCP session waiting to complete the three-way handshake.

questions.question_text: In which of the following states is a given session categorized as ephemeral? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AD
Answer A and D

Selected Answer: AD
Answer A and D

choices.C: It is a TCP session in ESTABLISHED state from 10.1.10.10 to 10.200.5.1.
choices.B: It is an ICMP session from 10.1.10.10 to 10.200.5.1.
choices.A: It is an ICMP session from 10.1.10.10 to 10.200.1.1.
choices.D: It is a TCP session in CLOSE_WAIT state from 10.1.10.10 to 10.200.1.1.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B is correct

Verbose levels in detail:

1: print header of packets
2: print header and data from IP of packets
3: print header and data from Ethernet of packets
4: print header of packets with interface name
5: print header and data from IP of packets with interface name
6: print header and data from Ethernet of packets with interface name

questions.question_text:
An administrator is running the following sniffer in a FortiGate: diagnose sniffer packet any "host 10.0.2.10" 2
What information is included in the output of the sniffer? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B is correct

choices.C: The debug shows only error messages. If there is no output, then the tunnel is operating normally.
choices.B: The log-filter setting was set incorrectly. The VPN's traffic does not match this filter.
choices.D: The debug output shows phase 1 negotiation only. After that, the administrator must enable the following real time debug: diagnose debug application ipsec -1.
choices.A: The debug output shows phases 1 and 2 negotiations only. Once the tunnel is up, it does not show any more output.
